Breach_ID: Unique identifier for each data breach incident to ensure traceability and reference.
Breach_Date: Date when the breach was reported or identified, providing a timeline for the incident.
Third_Party_Involved: Indicates whether a third party was involved in the breach, highlighting potential external vulnerabilities.
Data_Compromised: Type of data compromised during the breach, such as personal patient information or financial records.
Impact_Severity: Severity of the breach impact categorized as Low, Medium, or High, to assess the potential damage.
Regulatory_Implications: Regulatory changes or considerations resulting from the breach, informing compliance and security strategy.
Regulatory update to enhance third-party data protection
Review of third-party data handling policies
